system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provides point of sale retail software to small businesses. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: Customer reports intermittent timeout errors on the backend API.

conversation_history.message: Hi, I'm noticing occasional timeout errors when my staff tries to process transactions. It’s not happening every time, but it’s concerning.
Thanks for bringing this to our attention, Jane. Can you let us know the approximate times when the errors occurred and if there were specific actions being performed?
Sure, it happened yesterday around 3 PM and again this morning at about 9 AM. Both times were during checkout when processing card payments.
Got it. We’ll start by checking the backend logs for those times and review the performance metrics of the API. I’ll update you shortly.
Thanks, please let me know if you need anything else from my end.
Will do, Jane. I’ll keep you posted as soon as we have more information.
